title: Game Progress Route
content:
t the attacked village to find another Waypoint at (X:-84 Y:577). Proceed South West along the Risen Road until the Mountain Pass at (X:103 Y:553). Speak to Ellyka, who cautions against being seen, and choose from these options:

What's the issue? Who are you? I'd be concerned if I knew who they were. I didn't like that term you used. Watch your words. I'll leave.

Select the first choice, Ellyka reveals enemies below, suggesting an alternate route. Respond with:

Who are you? Your survival inst
